scenario_text.value:
Oh, you’re...
You’re just like normal.

Earlier you were telling Floramon to
back off.

I was just surprised.
Since Minoru was acting all weird and scared.

(Floramon seems uneasy. Maybe she can’t
figure out what Saki’s feeling.)

(If they can get along superficially,
I guess that’ll do for now...)

(Floramon doesn’t look good...
I’d better keep an eye on these two.)
